The airtankers all looked at Grimlock with a slack-jawed air and the
sense =
of impending doom they had dreaded. Add to that a touch of
pessimistic down=
 mood, and that was as accurate a description of their
sparks as could be.
=

Lock-on: Holy sh...

Motherload: Shut up. THAT wasn't anything I'd expecte=
d... Gunrain, is
this accurate with the activity we've been reported?

Gunr=
ain: Dam' right 'twas... Ow... That ain't gonna do us no good, Load...

Mot=
herload: It won't, but if we keep things like that, we're just
giving Unicr=
on  the keys to get in here and screw everything up.
Grimlock, take us to J=
otunn.
